attributes.action: Ensure a proper investigation of war crimes by Isreal against People of Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A proper investigation should be made of the use of illegal weapons by Isreal during their illegal attacks on Gaza , and those responsible brought to task at a war crimes tribunial , the UK goverment should assist in this investigation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
